channel.title: Join!
channel.description:
hello all, may i ask if you could please join our forums, it is an smf forum (simple machines forum) run by the best of players with outstanding active members online all day and everyday! you can simply join us at * it has many features including.
-no activation required! -great owner+players! -online 24-7 no forum downtime or maintainence! -very active players+forums and posts! -has enough catorgys/boards to keep you entertained! -including an ARCADE! (join to enjoy the Arcade) -every 50 members we gain, we have a tournament suggestion our players! -owner+co owner help in every way possible to make your time in the comunity enjoyable! -great layout and design on the smf-made by nickrulz1! (the co owner) -officual forum rules! -great spamming detecter! -outstanding members of the community become a staff member.
so come join us, and see what your missing!
*
thanks,
-bennyaka.

item.title: Join!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

advertising is not allowed.

also, if you want to use smf, use the hosted version.

Read full topic

item.title: Join!

item.description:
@bennyaka wrote:

hello all,
may i ask if you could please join our forums, it is an smf forum (simple machines forum) run by the best of players with outstanding active members online all day and everyday!
you can simply join us at *
it has many features including.

-no activation required!
-great owner+players!
-online 24-7 no forum downtime or maintainence!
-very active players+forums and posts!
-has enough catorgys/boards to keep you entertained!
-including an ARCADE! (join to enjoy the Arcade)
-every 50 members we gain, we have a tournament suggestion our players!
-owner+co owner help in every way possible to make your time in the comunity enjoyable!
-great layout and design on the smf-made by nickrulz1! (the co owner)
-officual forum rules!
-great spamming detecter!
-outstanding members of the community become a staff member.

so come join us, and see what your missing!

thanks,

-bennyaka.
